settings.subtitle: Our Story
settings.text: A pioneer in the portable power industry, Jackery innovation improves mobile living and outdoor life. Now you have the energy and power to go where you want to be.

settings.code:
About Jackery

Founded by a former Apple battery engineer in 2012, Jackery has been committed to providing outdoor green power solutions for the explorers. So Jackery launched the world's first lithium portable power station in 2015 and released the SolarSaga series solar panel in 2018.

A solar generator can technically refer to a solar solution that combines a portable power station with solar panels. Designed with outdoor enthusiasts in mind, the clean, quiet and convenient Jackery solar generator allows the explorers to enjoy an endless supply of power for extended time outdoors. Wish everyone enjoys the outdoor life.

Jackery Solar Generator. Power Outdoors.

settings.subtitle: Introducing
settings.title: Jackery Explorer Series
settings.text: You live life on your own terms, using technology to go outdoors and stay connected. This requires a lot of power. A pioneer in the industry, Jackery understood mobile life-styles would require outdoor portable power stations so you can keep going, even when you go off the grid. Jackery innovation and improved technology is the only way to supply your increasing need for power outdoors. Jackery Explorer, is designed to provide power outdoors. The solar-ready portable power station improves mobile living and outdoor life. Now you have the energy and power to go where you want to be. Jackery. Power Outdoors.

settings.subtitle: introducing
settings.title: Jackery SolarSaga Series
settings.text: Jackery SolarSaga solar panels can be folded and strapped for easy carry and use. With one of the highest 23.7% efficiency in the industry, you can make the most use of the sun and convert the sunlight into clean energy. By teaming up with the Jackery rechargeable portable power stations, solar power can be stored in lithium power station and keep all your gear charged. It can be a solar generator system for backup power and off-grid power.

settings.text_1: We value and sponsor social outreach and others that use our power solutions to impact lives and power life forward. Jackery encourages everyone to enjoy nature and outdoor life. #Jackerycare
settings.text_2: All Jackery power products have been certified to meet regulatory, safety, and environmental standards that meet or exceed market demand. We are committed to strict quality control, customer service and reliability that earns the trust of our customers.

settings.subtitle: Explorer Power Stations
settings.text: Power for whatever you do, wherever you go. Pick up a lightweight, powerful Explorer and go places.

settings.code:
Portable Power Stations to charge and explore

What is a portable power station?

A Portable power station is a rechargeable battery-powered generator. Equipped with AC outlet, DC carport and USB charging ports, they can keep all your gear charged, from smartphones, tablets, laptops, to CPAP and small appliances, like fan, mini coolers, electric blankets, etc.

How does a portable power station work?

Actually, it is a DC to AC inverter that increases the DC voltage, and then changes it to alternating current before sending it out to power a device, like your laptop and TV. The DC input port collects and store the electricity/energy from an AC outlet or a solar panel and output through buit-in USB ports, DC carport or an AC outlet.

What are the benefits of a portable power station?

Compared with a gas powered generator, a battery powered generator is working without noise, fume and pollution. And it can team up with a compatible solar panel, you can get the energy from the sun power, it is renewable and economical in the long terms. As the name suggests, it is portable, you can take it anywhere anytime.
Introducing Jackery Explorer Series Portable Power Stations

settings.text_1: Jackery Explorer 1000 is Jackery's biggest power station, and a solar generator for outdoor recreations. With 1002Wh capacity, 1000W rated power & multiple output charge/recharge ports, it meets the power supply needs of higher and most power electrical appliances.
settings.text_2: Jackery Explorer 500 Portable Power Station is one of the smallest and lightest 518Wh rechargeable lithium battery generators in the market. Keep charged and  connected on the go. Perfect for indoor backup power and outdoor power source.
settings.text_3: Jackery Explorer 240 is equipped with a 240 watt-hour (16.8Ah, 14.4V) lithium-ion battery pack, no fuel or gasoline needed, no fumes, no clanging! Take the lightweight Explorer 240 with you on cottage trips, excursions, or anywhere your weekend takes you.

settings.code: Compare Explorer Series Models
Power Supply Made for Off Grid

settings.text: The Jackery Explorer series are rechargeable portable power supply with outlet, DC and USB ports. They are made for outdoor recreations, like backpacking, camping, and Van or RV living. No noise, no fume, you can keep charged and connected when you are having fun.

settings.subtitle: Camping Gear
settings.title: Power Camping
settings.text: Whether you’re seeking outdoor adventure, camping, weekend getaways, or good times at the cottage with family and friends, take a Jackery Explorer to power up your gear. Now you can power up the fun at lakeside recreation, marine life, backyard party or tailgating.

settings.subtitle: Home Backup Power
settings.title: Prepare for Emergency
settings.text: Stock up on the backup power, gear up for any unexpected emergencies, like hurricane seasons and power outage. Stay connected and safe during the hard time.

settings.subtitle: Solar Power Ready
settings.title: Power from the sun
settings.text: With the optional Solar Panel attachment (sold separately), you can leave your portable power station to charge with the sun and come back to a full battery you can use day or night.

settings.code: Explore Outdoors in the City and out in the Country.

settings.text_1: Enjoy an off-grid mean when you are tailgating or have an outdoor barbecue. Throw the ultimate outdoor gathering with portable power to run fridges, coolers, blenders, music, and more.
settings.text_2: Creativity can come from anywhere when it occurs to you. You can stary away from the walls and eight-hour rule to work anywhere.
settings.text_3: Being on-the-road can be a fantastic reality, while being powerless off-the-grid can be a nightmare. Enjoy the mobile life and stay powered. After all, you can charge your power station via solar and even your car port.

settings.code: Portable Power Station You Can Trust.

settings.text: Jackery Explorer is as safe as it is powerful. Enjoy the peace of mind that comes with surge and short circuit protection, temperature control, and a pure sine wave inverter. And for those just in case scenarios, Jackery Explorer provides the power to charge your important devices. Now you can be ready in case of an emergency or power outages.

settings.subtitle: Quality guaranteed
settings.title: Safety by Design
settings.text:
Battery management system (BMS) enables short circuit protection, voltage control, temperature control and more advanced safety operations. Other enhanced safety features includes:

· Powerful built-in LED flashlight with SOS mode

· LCD screen with charge/discharge and battery life status

· Switch with indicator light for on/off output port charging

· Equipped with lithium Nickel Manganese Cobalt Oxide (NMC) battery, the same type of battery that Tesla uses in their Powerwall units.

settings.title: Testimonials
settings.testimonial_1: With its Amazon best-seller Explorer 160, Jackery is a well-known name in portable power stations or outdoor gear.
settings.testimonial_2: Both of the Honda-licensed power stations are solar ready, making them truly ready for your next excusion.

settings.subtitle: Harness the Power of the Sun
settings.text: Collect solar energy to charge your smartphones and Jackery portable power stations.

settings.code: Portable Solar Panels Off the grid Power

settings.text: Jackery portable solar panels can be folded and strapped for easy carry and use. With one of the highest 23.7% efficiency in the industry, you can make the most use of the sun and convert the sunlight into clean energy. By teaming up with the Jackery rechargeable portable power stations, solar power can be stored in lithium power station and keep all your gear charged. It can be a solar generator system for backup power and off-grid power.

settings.text_1: Foldable design with a TPE rubber handle and durable cloth, zipper and PET material, SolarSaga 60W is made for portability, durability and efficiency in the solar panel market.
settings.text_2: One of the highest charging efficiency: Power your larger lithium power stations with the SolarSaga 100W Solar Panel. With adjustable kickstands and max 23.7% efficiency, it is perfect for camping and RV life use.
settings.text_3: IP67 grade waterproof, prevent the intrusion of foreign objects, dust and short-term immersion under water. Maximize solar input power and obtains very high light transmittance to increase recharging speed.

settings.subtitle: High Efficiency
settings.title: Monocrystalline Solar Panels
settings.text: Made with monocrystalline solar cells, and equipped with adjustable stands, the charging efficiency can be up to 23.7%. Make the most use of the solar power.

settings.subtitle: trouble-free Connection
settings.title: Easy Plug & Play Operation
settings.text: Pairing the Solar Panel with your Power Station is easy.  Simply connect DC interface with the DC input of your portable power station.

settings.subtitle: Fold and Go
settings.title: Easy Portability
settings.text: Explorer Solar Panels are designed for Portability.  You get maximum exposure to the sun when using the Solar Panel, and great portability by folding and packing in a neat bag when storing or travelling with the Panel

settings.subtitle: Solar System Bundle
settings.title: Unlimited Power Source
settings.text: By working with Jackery portable power stations (sold separately), you can store the solar energy with the fastest speed, and charge most gear through AC, DC and USB charging ports. Smart solar made easy than ever before.

settings.code: Explore Outdoors. In the heat or in the cold.
FAQ

settings.text:
Q1: What is a solar panel?
A: Definition: A solar panel is the device which is used to absorb the sun's rays and convert them into electricity or heat.
Description: A solar panel is actually a collection of solar (or photovoltaic) cells, which can be used to generate electricity through the photovoltaic effect. So, please note that the solar panel needs to be used with a power station, and the only way to use the solar panel is to put it under the sunlight. It can't store any electricity, nor can the solar panel be charged by a wall charger or other charging devices.

Q2: What are the advantages of portable solar panels?
A:1. A solar panel has a small size allowing for easy maneuverability. They don't take up a lot of space, offering easy storage and organization.
2. Unlike stationary solar panels, the portable panel can be carried around as needed. It comes to use for different functions or activities. For instance, portable panels work their best in both fixed positions and mobile use. This means that they are not only suitable for emergency/home use but also convenient for outdoor activities, such as camping.
3. A solar panel is reliable. Solar energy will be accessible as long as we have the sun. It is great for when you are going outdoors and in need of electricity to power appliances.

Q3: Do solar panels work at night?
A: Sorry, solar panels cannot work at night. Please note that solar panels work by absorbing sunlight and converting it into electricity. Therefore, sunny conditions and needed for solar panels to work.

Q4: At what temperature do solar panels stop working?
A: Operating temperature range: 14-149F (-10-65℃)Storage temperature range: 14-149F (-10-65℃), humidity not more than 60%. The Solar panel will not stop working because of high temperature. After exceeding 65℃, the efficiency of the solar panel will be reduced by 1% for each degree of increased temperature.

settings.text: Licensed lithium-ion portable power stations. Brand power for outdoor recreations.

Honda by Jackery

Lightweight, Lithium Power Stations

settings.text_1: Lithium-ion portable power station featuring 292 Watt-hour energy storage. The Honda 290 Power station provides safe, quiet mobile power.
settings.text_2: The most compact and lightest Lithium-Ion portable power station in its class at only 3.83 pounds, the HLS200 provides a 208 Watt-hour energy storage.
settings.text_3: With an adventure-ready IP67 rating, the Honda by Jackery HPC9000 is a rugged power bank featuring a 9,000 mAh power supply capable of going anywhere outdoor enthusiasts want to be.

settings.subtitle: Introducing
settings.title: Honda by Jackery
settings.text:
Portable Power Stations

Wherever the journey takes you, our innovative line of Honda by Jackery portable power supply products are the perfect solution for those seeking a sustainable portable power supply source with the flexibility to simultaneously charge multiple electronic devices while venturing outdoors. Now you can better connect with the outdoors, power up the fun and be ready in case of an emergency.

settings.subtitle: Peace of mind
settings.title: Warranty
settings.text: All Honda by Jackery products come with a two year warranty.  You also get a 30-Day Money Back Guarantee.

settings.subtitle: Jackery Portable Chargers
settings.text: Many options to carry power in your pocket to keep the important devices powered and ready to go!

settings.code: Portable Charger With Ultimate Power Portability

settings.text: Jackery portable chargers, or so called power banks come in pocket size from mini 3350mAh to 26800mAh capacity battery. With smart charging, quick charging and USB Type-C Power Delivery charging, you have various options and budgets to choose what fit you best. Portable chargers for iPhone and Android.

settings.subtitle: Various options to choose from
settings.title: One-Stop Charging Solutions
settings.text: From budget mini charger, to latest USB Power Delivery portable charger, you have various battery capacity and charging features to fit you.

settings.subtitle: Trouble-free charging
settings.title: Portable Charger for iPhone
settings.text: With built-in MFi certificated Lightning cable and smart charging technology, Jackery Bolt power bank can charge iPhone and iPad with max 5V/2.4A speed. With two built-in cables, you can charge two devices simultaneously.

settings.title: Need More Power?
settings.subheading: Check out our portable power stations.

settings.code: Features & Benefits | Specifications | User Manual | How to Charge | What it Powers | Safety by Design

Features & Benefits

Power-to-go, in a compact, lightweight design featuring multiple connections to charge your mainstream gear and more. Use it in indoors or take Explorer with you for outdoor recreation, backyard power, hiking, office use, recreational outings, camping, and much more.

  • Lithium battery power: 167Wh Battery capacity charges and re-charges devices
  • Portable and compact, only 3.86 lbs. in a compact size of just 7.5” x 4.5” x 6.7”
  • Multiple power connections including: three USB ports, AC outlet and 12V car output
  • Recharges three ways: AC wall outlet, 12V car outlet or via optional 50w solar panel
  • Includes built-in bright LED flashlight with SOS mode
  • Info LCD display screen provides charge and discharge status, and reports power use
  • Power buttons with indicator light for each of the output port charging
  • 2-Year Jackery Warranty, including battery
  • Optional 50W portable solar panel

Specifications

Explorer Series Explorer 160
Battery Capacity  167Wh 
Rated Output Power  100W (Peak 150W) 
Rated Input Power  (DC 8MM) 12V~30V 42W Max 
AC  110V 
Built in 12v Car Port  No - DC to Car Outlet cable provided
USB Ports 1@ USB-C (5V/3A); 2@ USB-A (5V/2.4A) 
DC  6mm (12V/7A) 
Recharge Power source AC Wall Outlet, 12V Car Outlet, Solar Panel
Size  7.4" x 4.5" x 6.7" 
Weight  3.84 lbs.

Customer Support

Have product support questions? Find answers to common questions on FAQ page here the FAQ tabs on each product page. You can also send us an email to hello@jackery.com We will respond to you within one business day. Feel free to call us at 1-888-502-2236. We are open Monday to Friday from 9:00 am to 6:00pm PST.
User Guides

Download free user guides for all of our products. The guides contain detailed information on technical specifications, operational instructions, and general care for the products.

Product Registration

Register your product to receive the latest Jackery updates and opt-in to receive special offers.
Shipping Policy, Warranty & Return Policy

See details on our shipping policy, comprehensive 2-year warranty and return policy for your Jackery purchases on our jackery.com store.

settings.title: Warranty Registration
settings.text: Register your Jackery Product with us to ensure we can contact you regarding your product and ensure Warranty details are complete.

settings.title: Welcome to Jackery
settings.text:
Thank you for choosing Jackery. We are honored to welcome you as a customer. We design our products with safety and durability, supported by our two-year warranty program. Please note, warranty service can only be provided with your bill of sale as proof of purchase.

Registering your product allows us to reach you instantly, in the very unlikely event a safety notice were ever to be issued. Plus, if you were to ever experience an unfortunate occurrence (fire, flood, theft, etc.) your registration may serve as proof for an insurance loss claim.

settings.subtitle: AutoZone Jackery – Power to Go
settings.title: Promotion
settings.text: Purchase one or more Qualifying Products from AutoZone between July 01, 2019 and October 31, 2019 and receive a Honda by Jackery HPC 9000 power bank.

settings.title: Program Rules
settings.text:
1.  Purchase one or more Qualifying Products from AutoZone between July 01, 2019 and October 31, 2019 and receive a Honda by Jackery HPC 9000 power bank.

2.  Include your AutoZone identified and dated purchase receipt showing the required qualifying product(s) purchase between the promotion period. (Retain your original receipt for warranty purposes.) For online, you may upload a copy of your receipt as a PDF or JPEG file, or mail-in a copy of your receipt.

3.  Any rebate claims received with a purchase receipt date after October 31, 2019 will not be honored.

4.  This offer cannot be combined with any other promotion or program.

5.  Offer limited to one rebate per qualified product(s), for a maximum ten (10) rebates per person / household.

6.  Rebate program applies to AutoZone customers only. Offer Code: AZ-HBJ-HPC9000-MIR.

7.  Any product returned for credit is not eligible to receive the rebate.

8.  Offer valid only in USA and sales regions of AutoZone.

9.  Rebate offer expires if rebate claim is not made within 60 days of the purchase date, after which time JACKERY will have no further obligation to you.

10.  Fulfillment of qualifying rebate application may take 6-8 weeks to fulfill and receive.

11.  JACKERY is not responsible for lost, destroyed, misdirected, postage due to delayed mail, or any incorrect information provided by you to JACKERY.

12.  All personal information collected will only be used for the purposes of administering this promotion.

Complete the form below and follow instructions to submit a request online, OR If you do not have Internet access and unable to submit your mail-in rebate redemption via our web site, you may download the rebate form and send a copy of your receipt and completed form to:

JACKERY Inc., 48521 Warm Springs Blvd, unit 313, Fremont, CA 94539 USA

Questions or feedback may be directed to:

JACKERY Inc., 48521 Warm Springs Blvd, unit 313, Fremont, CA 94539 USA

hello@jackery.com

Toll-free: 888-502-2236

settings.subtitle: Charging convenience, achieves a full charge in 1.8 hours (from wall or solar)

settings.title: Explorer 1000 Pro
settings.subtitle: Featuring automotive-level BMS for superior safety, power with peace of mind.

settings.title: SolarSaga 80W
settings.subtitle: Dual-sided panel technology takes power generation efficiency to the next-level.

settings.title: Go Green, Even Off-Grid
settings.subtitle_1: Jackery fully unlocks outdoor exploration, allowing clean charging efficiency
settings.subtitle_2: and accessibility on or off the grid.
settings.text_1_info: Pure clean energy for a healthy planet.

settings.title: Absolute Power
settings.info: Delivering enormous charging capacity at 2,160Wh, this groundbreaking Explorer powers all your imaginable appliances including hot plates, full sized refrigerators, air conditioners and more. It’s all ideal - taking your amazing family trips to the next level, adventuring with power to the beautiful unknown, and off-griding to the most inspiring scenarios. You have the power to impress.

settings.section_subtitle: The power station can be fully charged with 6 SolarSaga 200W solar panels in under 2.5 hours. Going further and to locations you've never dreamed of with the sun's power. It also supports pass-through charging, letting you charge your power station while getting essential devices plugged in.

settings.section_subtitle_1: The battery features comprehensive circuit protection with Jackery’s built-in Battery Management System (BMS)™
settings.section_subtitle_2: Two chips inside the battery offer dual-protection for maximum safety. The  lithium battery features four temperature core detectors. This allows the temperature regulation, when charging delivering safety and reliability. The battery is extremely efficient resulting in a low charging temperature for cooler charging.

settings.section_subtitle: Charging Time  is a Full Charge

settings.p_des:
A simple press of a button, and access to outstanding charging 
efficiency becomes ready in seconds - solar power to you instantly.

The upgraded LCD screen display includes a fault code and low battery 
indicator delivering high-quality information, making it clear and easy to understand.
The first ever newly designed foldable handle on the power station makes it easy to carry on the go, for all your favourite journeys.

settings.section_subtitle:
The Explorer 2000 Pro emits no toxic gases, operating extremely cleanly - causing no harm to the environment. Moreover, the product operates with less than 53 DB, 
ensuring whisper quiet and peaceful charging.

settings.title: 3-Year Warranty
settings.sub: We provide our customers with an exclusive 3-year warranty for every purchase from our our official store.

settings.title: Chat with us
settings.sub: Our excellent 24/7 customer service can answer all your important product questions.

settings.title: Reinventing Solar Charging
settings.info:
The Solar Generator 2000 Pro delivers colossal charging capacity of 2,160Wh, utilizing the sun's magnificent energy, powering it all - 
refrigerators, ovens, microwaves and more. Solar Charging has transformed forever -  journey to the world's most spectacular places with the sun's powerful energy, road trip and explore the great outdoors and enjoy life to the fullest with friends. Solar Power is here.

settings.section_subtitle:
The power station can be fully charged with 6 SolarSaga 200W solar panels in only under 2.5 hours. Using the majestic and powerful sun's energy go to places you've never been before. Pass-through charging also lets you charge your power station conveniently while still charging your devices 
simultaneously. Solar power has arrived.

settings.section_subtitle_1: The battery features comprehensive circuit protection with Jackery’s built-in Battery Management System (BMS)™
settings.section_subtitle_2: Two chips inside the battery offer dual-protection for maximum safety. The  lithium battery features four temperature core detectors. This allows the temperature regulation, when charging delivering safety and reliability. The battery is extremely efficient resulting in a low charging temperature for cooler charging.

settings.p_des:
A simple press of a button, and access to outstanding charging 
efficiency becomes ready in seconds - solar power to you instantly.

The upgraded LCD screen display includes a fault code and low battery 
indicator delivering high-quality information, making it clear and easy to understand.
The first ever newly designed foldable handle on the power station makes it easy to carry on the go, for all your favourite journeys.

settings.section_subtitle_1:
The Solar Generator 2000 PRO emits no toxic gases, operating extremely cleanly - causing no harm to the environment. Moreover, the product operates with less than 53 DB, 
ensuring whisper quiet and peaceful charging.

settings.title: 3-Year Warranty
settings.sub: We provide our customers with an exclusive 3-year warranty for every purchase from our our official store.

settings.title: Chat with us
settings.sub: Our excellent 24/7 customer service can answer all your important product questions.

settings.section_subtitle_1: Taking just 2.5 hours to charge the Jackery Portable Power Station Explorer 200 Pro via 6 Solar Saga 600, the Solar Saga 600 reinvents solar charging. Solar charging is the future - venture with the Sun’s power to the end’s of the earth, experiencing the great power you hold.

settings.section_subtitle: Taking just a few seconds to setup, the solar panel stands firmly and securely thanks to its 3 kickstands. The recommended angle ensures optimum absorption of the sunlight, making it the perfect companion for outdoor travels. Get ready to set forth anywhere on the planet with solar.

settings.section_subtitle_1: A practical carrying bag is included for easy transport. Magnetic pads on the solar panel allow the the solar panel to be folded up tightly and carried on your favourite off-grid journeys.

The ETFE-laminated case ensures the solar panel is durable enough for a prolonged lifespan. 
Additionally the IP67 Waterproof Rating allows it to withstand harsh and wet weather.

settings.info_des: Delivering enormous charging capacity at 2,160Wh, this groundbreaking Explorer powers all your imaginable appliances including hot plates, full sized refrigerators, air conditioners and more. It’s all ideal - taking your amazing family trips to the next level, adventuring with power to the beautiful unknown, and off-griding to the most inspiring scenarios. You have the power to impress.

settings.section_subtitle: The power station can be fully charged with 6 SolarSaga 200W solar panels in under 2.5 hours. Going further and to locations you've never dreamed of with the sun's power. It also supports pass-through charging, letting you charge your power station while getting essential devices plugged in.

settings.notice_content:
Members who have registered can participate in this activity. Enter your email address and share the personalized link on social media to refer your friends. They will receive a 15% discount after registering. For each friend you refer successfully, you will receive a coupon once they purchase a Jackery item.
After your referred friend's first purchase, you will receive a 15% off coupon. Then, starting with your second referred friend's purchase, you will receive a 20% off coupon for each successful referral. There are 10,000 coupons available while stocks last.

settings.notice_title: 2. What reward will my friend receive when being reffered?
settings.notice_content: By clicking on your personalized link and entering their email address, your friend will receive a 15% off coupon.

settings.notice_title: 3. Can my reffered friends participate multiple times?
settings.notice_content:
No. One friend can only participate in this activity as a new user once. If your friend registered an email and placed an order by your link, they can’t receive the same activity discount as a new user through another referrer's link.
For example, if Person A shares the link with Person B, and Person B successfully registers through the link. Then, if Person C shares their link with Person B, Person B cannot get a discount through Person C's link (as a new user).

settings.notice_title: 4. How do I get my coupon?
settings.notice_content: The coupon will be sent to the email address you entered when you registered. The coupon is valid for 60 days from the date it is sent.

settings.notice_title: 5. How do I use the coupon I received? Are there any restrictions?
settings.notice_content: Coupons received from this activity cannot be used in conjunction with other discounts. Also, the discount does not apply to Explorer 240 & Solar Generator 240 items.

settings.notice_title: 6. If I wish to return a product that was purchased with this discount, what will I get refunded?
settings.notice_content: If you purchase an item using a discount from this activity, you will be refunded the actual payment amount.

settings.notice_title: 7. All final interpretations lie solely with Jackery.

settings.form_subtitle: Share your personalized link with your friends, who will get 15% off their first order. Once they’ve made a purchase, you will get 15% off your next order. You have a chance to save more than $500!

settings.notice_content: Congratulations, you have been referred! Here is a gift from your friend who has registered on jackery.com. Enter your email and you will receive a coupon code. With this code, you can get 15% off your purchase on jackery.com.

settings.notice_title: 2. What reward can my referrer get?
settings.notice_content: After you complete your first purchase on jackery.com, your referrer will receive a 15% off coupon.

settings.notice_title: 3. Can I be referred and participate multiple times?
settings.notice_content:
No. You can only participate in the activity as a new user once. If you registered an email from one referrer's link, you can't receive the same activity discount as a new user through another referrer's link.
For example, if Person A shares the link with Person B, and Person B successfully registers through the link. Then, if Person C shares their link with Person B, Person B cannot get a discount through Person C's link (as a new user).

settings.notice_title: 4. How do I use the coupon I received? Are there any restrictions?
settings.notice_content:
The coupon code will be generated after you enter an email address. Copy and save it. When you shop on jackery.com, enter the code on the payment page, and you will get 15% off your order.
The coupons are valid for 60 days from the date the code is generated. Coupons received from this activity cannot be used in conjunction with other discounts. Also, the discount does not apply to Explorer 240 & Solar Generator 240 items.

settings.notice_title: 5. If I wish to return a product that was purchased with this discount, what will I get refunded?
settings.notice_content: If you purchase an item using a discount from this activity, you will be refunded the actual payment amount.

settings.notice_title: 6. All final interpretations lie solely with Jackery.

settings.form_title: A Gift From Your Friend – 15% OFF Coupon！
settings.form_subtitle:
Enter your email and get 15% OFF your next purchase on jackery.com.
After you complete a purchase, your referrer will receive a 15% OFF coupon.
You both have a chance to save more than $500！
